title: The Facebook “Whistleblower” Exposed! (Ep 1621)
description:
The Facebook “whistleblower” has now been fully exposed! In this episode, I address the real reason she’s speaking out. I also address the latest Project Veritas video about the Pfizer vaccine. 

News Picks:


It’s a trap! Don’t fall for the Facebook “whistleblower.”


The risk of a major world war is grave. China is pushing and pushing.

About that national divorce.

Liberals are changing the names to disguise their CRT agenda.

The Secret Service report on school safety.

The hapless Treasury Secretary pushes to monitor your bank account.
